verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- though יַעֲמֹ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mod stood מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto me Though Moses וּשְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> u-she-mu-'El and Samuel לְפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai, before אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein Me נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi me [yet] my mind אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am [could] not [be] toward this people הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> shal-Lach cast [them] out מֵֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> me-'al- from פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai of my sight וְיֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ye-Tze-'u. and let them go forth

וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall be that כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when יֹאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru And it shall come to pass if they say אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you אָ֣נָה <S%H575><s%> 'A-nah Where נֵצֵ֑א <S%H3318><s%> ne-Tze; unto thee Whither shall we go forth וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta ;then thou shalt tell אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar them Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher those לַמָּ֤וֶת <S%H4194><s%> lam-Ma-vet Such as [are] for death לַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> lam-Ma-vet to death וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and those לַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> la-Che-rev and such as [are] for the sword לַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> la-Che-rev, to the sword וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and those לָֽרָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> la-ra-'Av and such as [are] for the famine לָֽרָעָ֔ב <S%H7458><s%> la-ra-'Av, to the famine וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and those לַשְּׁבִ֖י <S%H7628><s%> lash-she-Vi and such as [are] for the captivity לַשֶּֽׁבִי׃ <S%H7628><s%> lash-She-vi. to the captivity

וּנְתַתִּ֣ים <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Tim And I will cause; לִזְוָעָה liz-va-'ah כלְזַֽעֲוָ֔ה <S%H2113><s%> le-za-'a-Vah, be removed קלְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> mam-le-Chot into all kingdoms הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the earth בִּ֠גְלַל <S%H1558><s%> Big-lal because מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יְחִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2396><s%> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu of Hezekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al for אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah for [that] which he did בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. in Jerusalem

[since] they return

[yet] every one of them doth curse ס sa-Mek

[which] shall burn ס sa-Mek
